channel.title: Can't open my shops?
channel.description:
I keep trying to add shops to the server and every time i do i cant access them and i cant even click on them. Heres a picture of the NPC and the options displayed. I've done several tutorials on how to do these and i don't think they seem to work unless i'm using a wrong tutorial. Please note that this a 508.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/20zzhu1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Can't open my shops?
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

I dont know much about 508.
But take a npc that has “Talk to” or “Trade” option?

Read full topic
